roleset.name: alternate expression of sell

roles.note: See "sell" for examples of other arguments.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01 Task 3. Framed by Claire. Comparison to sell.

example.name: with expression of price
example.text: I have been searching for some time now , and I ca n't seem to find a dropshipper that-1 *-1 sales merchandise low enough so I could profit from it .
example.arg: so I could profit from it.
